title: How do I create a playlist?
answer:
1. Go to Music and touch Playlists then Create new playlist. 

 2. Enter the playlist name and touch Save. 

 3. In the displayed dialog box, touch OK. Select the songs you want to add to the playlist, and touch ADD.
